title: 1.4.7服务端报错问题
author: mima210
txt_content:
[m
2013-03-04 13:13:45 [SEVERE] Could not pass event PlayerInteractEvent to LWC v4.3.1 (b767-git-MANUAL) (November 15, 2012)

似乎是和LWC插件冲突，有什么好解决办法么？
服务器用的MOD 。红石2.建筑.铁路

replies.author: mima210
replies.txt_content:
strawmaine 发表于 2013-3-4 14:52 
尝试更新插件先：http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/lwc/files/33-lwc-4-3-2-beta/
我试试吧。十分感谢
